replies.msg: Let’s start with agriculture then

It’s impossible right now. No other country would support us and we don’t have our own military force.
we should focus on democracy for now.

Absolutely, we need to have our own water and electricity.
Like other country, students join military at 18 years old for one year before university.

Although we won't have abundant natural resources, we can get what we wanted through trading and marketing.
But most importantly, Hong Kong need to develop his own solid industry but not just financial sector, only speculating on stocks and properties.

So, first of all, after independence, we need to kick those Chinese companies out of our land. We need to have 90% of Hong Kong companies in Hong Kong with the management level all being HongKongers but not Chinese. Chinese people can work in Hong Kong but only in lower level but not management level.

After independence, Hong Kong need to speed up the housing supply process, turning down all Real Estate Developers in Hong Kong, no people need to rent house.

After independence, we need to enforce the Standard Working Hours with only 40 hours a week, otherwise with overtime compensation of at least 1.5 times.

By doing that, we can build a "安居樂業" Hong Kong.

I hope I am not dreaming...
It should, but cost long time to happen
